âœ… /src/js/componentes.js

Agrega este script para:

  1. Cargar dinÃ¡micamente el header.

  2. Detectar scroll y modificar clases del header y estilos.

js
// Cargar header dinÃ¡mico
fetch("src/components/header.html")
  .then(res => res.text())
  .then(data => {
    document.getElementById("header").innerHTML = data;

    // Scroll behavior
    const header = document.getElementById("mainHeader");
    const links = document.querySelectorAll(".nav-link");

    const setActiveLink = () => {
      const path = window.location.pathname.split("/").pop();
      links.forEach(link => {
        if (link.getAttribute("href") === path) {
          link.classList.add("text-moradopa");
        } else {
          link.classList.remove("text-moradopa");
        }
      });
    };

    const handleScroll = () => {
      if (window.scrollY > 20) {
        header.classList.remove("bg-transparent");
        header.classList.add("bg-celestepa", "shadow-md");
      } else {
        header.classList.remove("bg-celestepa", "shadow-md");
        header.classList.add("bg-transparent");
      }
    };

    setActiveLink();
    handleScroll();
    window.addEventListener("scroll", handleScroll);
  });

js
// Cargar dinÃ¡micamente el header
fetch("src/components/header.html")
  .then(res => res.text())
  .then(data => {
    document.getElementById("header").innerHTML = data;

    const header = document.getElementById("mainHeader");
    const links = document.querySelectorAll(".nav-link");
    const path = window.location.pathname.split("/").pop();

    // Asignar color activo y mostrar desplegable solo en la pÃ¡gina actual
    links.forEach(link => {
      const href = link.getAttribute("href");
      const toggleId = "toggle-" + href.split(".")[0];
      const submenuId = "submenu-" + href.split(".")[0];

      if (href === path || (path === "" && href === "index.html")) {
        link.classList.add("text-moradopa");

        // Mostrar Ã­cono y permitir desplegar
        const toggle = document.getElementById(toggleId);
        const submenu = document.getElementById(submenuId);
        if (toggle && submenu) {
          toggle.classList.remove("hidden");

          toggle.addEventListener("click", e => {
            e.preventDefault();
            submenu.classList.toggle("hidden");
          });

          link.addEventListener("click", e => {
            e.preventDefault(); // evitar redirecciÃ³n
            submenu.classList.toggle("hidden");
          });
        }
      }
    });

    // Scroll dinÃ¡mico
    const handleScroll = () => {
      if (window.scrollY > 20) {
        header.classList.remove("bg-transparent");
        header.classList.add("bg-celestepa", "shadow-md");
      } else {
        header.classList.remove("bg-celestepa", "shadow-md");
        header.classList.add("bg-transparent");
      }
    };

    handleScroll();
    window.addEventListener("scroll", handleScroll);
  });

ðŸ“Œ Notas:

  • Solo se desplegarÃ¡ el submenÃº si estÃ¡s en la pÃ¡gina correspondiente.

  • Si no estÃ¡s en esa pÃ¡gina, el Ã­cono ni el menÃº se mostrarÃ¡n.

  • El menÃº aparece/cierra con clic, sin recargar.

// Cargar header dinÃ¡micamente
fetch("src/components/header.html")
  .then(res => res.text())
  .then(data => {
    document.getElementById("header").innerHTML = data;

    const header = document.getElementById("mainHeader");
    const links = document.querySelectorAll(".nav-link");
    const currentPage = window.location.pathname.split("/").pop() || "index.html";

    // Determinar pÃ¡gina actual
    const pageMap = {
      "index.html": "inicio",
      "nosotros.html": "nosotros",
      "servicios.html": "servicios",
    };

    const currentKey = pageMap[currentPage];

    if (currentKey) {
      const currentLink = document.getElementById(`link-${currentKey}`);
      const currentToggle = document.getElementById(`toggle-${currentKey}`);
      const currentSubmenu = document.getElementById(`submenu-${currentKey}`);

      // Activar color de link
      currentLink.classList.add("text-moradopa");

      // Mostrar Ã­cono y habilitar colapso
      if (currentToggle && currentSubmenu) {
        currentToggle.classList.remove("hidden");

        currentLink.addEventListener("click", e => {
          e.preventDefault(); // Evita redirecciÃ³n
          currentSubmenu.classList.toggle("hidden");
        });
      }
    }

    // Scroll dinÃ¡mico
    const handleScroll = () => {
      if (window.scrollY > 20) {
        header.classList.remove("bg-transparent");
        header.classList.add("bg-celestepa", "shadow-md");
      } else {
        header.classList.remove("bg-celestepa", "shadow-md");
        header.classList.add("bg-transparent");
      }
    };

    handleScroll();
    window.addEventListener("scroll", handleScroll);
  });

âœ… /src/js/componentes.js (actualizado con cierre al hacer clic fuera)

js
fetch("src/components/header.html")
  .then(res => res.text())
  .then(data => {
    document.getElementById("header").innerHTML = data;

    const header = document.getElementById("mainHeader");
    const currentPage = window.location.pathname.split("/").pop() || "index.html";

    const pageMap = {
      "index.html": "inicio",
      "nosotros.html": "nosotros",
      "servicios.html": "servicios",
    };

    const currentKey = pageMap[currentPage];

    if (currentKey) {
      const currentLink = document.getElementById(`link-${currentKey}`);
      const currentToggle = document.getElementById(`toggle-${currentKey}`);
      const currentSubmenu = document.getElementById(`submenu-${currentKey}`);

      // Activar estilo
      currentLink.classList.add("text-moradopa");
      currentToggle.classList.remove("hidden");

      // Mostrar/ocultar al hacer clic
      currentLink.addEventListener("click", e => {
        e.preventDefault();
        currentSubmenu.classList.toggle("hidden");
      });

      // Cierre al hacer clic fuera del menÃº
      document.addEventListener("click", function (event) {
        const isClickInside = currentLink.contains(event.target) || currentSubmenu.contains(event.target);
        if (!isClickInside) {
          currentSubmenu.classList.add("hidden");
        }
      });
    }

    // Efecto scroll
    const handleScroll = () => {
      if (window.scrollY > 20) {
        header.classList.remove("bg-transparent");
        header.classList.add("bg-celestepa", "shadow-md");
      } else {
        header.classList.remove("bg-celestepa", "shadow-md");
        header.classList.add("bg-transparent");
      }
    };

    handleScroll();
    window.addEventListener("scroll", handleScroll);
  });

      const currentLink = document.getElementById(`link-${currentKey}`);
      const currentToggle = document.getElementById(`toggle-${currentKey}`);
      currentSubmenu = document.getElementById(`submenu-${currentKey}`);

      // Estilo activo
      currentLink.classList.add("text-moradopa");
      currentToggle.classList.remove("hidden");

      // Mostrar / ocultar
      currentLink.addEventListener("click", e => {
        e.preventDefault();
        currentSubmenu.classList.toggle("hidden");
      });

      // Cierre al hacer clic fuera
      document.addEventListener("click", function (event) {
        const isClickInside = currentLink.contains(event.target) || currentSubmenu.contains(event.target);
        if (!isClickInside) {
          currentSubmenu.classList.add("hidden");
        }
      });
    }

    // FunciÃ³n de scroll
    const handleScroll = () => {
      if (window.scrollY > 20) {
        header.classList.remove("bg-transparent");
        header.classList.add("bg-celestepa", "shadow-md");

        // Cerrar el submenÃº si estÃ¡ abierto
        if (currentSubmenu && !currentSubmenu.classList.contains("hidden")) {
          currentSubmenu.classList.add("hidden");
        }
      } else {
        header.classList.remove("bg-celestepa", "shadow-md");
        header.classList.add("bg-transparent");
      }
    };

    handleScroll();
    window.addEventListener("scroll", handleScroll);
  });

const mobileMenu = document.getElementById("mobileMenu");
const mobileOverlay = document.getElementById("mobileOverlay");

  mobileMenu.classList.remove("translate-x-full");

  mobileMenu.classList.add("translate-x-full");
  mobileOverlay.classList.add("hidden");
};

mobileBtn?.addEventListener("click", openMobileMenu);
mobileOverlay?.addEventListener("click", closeMobileMenu);

js
// Cargar el header dinÃ¡micamente
fetch("src/components/header.html")
  .then(res => res.text())
  .then(data => {
    document.getElementById("header").innerHTML = data;

    const header = document.getElementById("mainHeader");
    const currentPage = window.location.pathname.split("/").pop() || "index.html";

    const pageMap = {
      "index.html": "inicio",
      "nosotros.html": "nosotros",
      "servicios.html": "servicios",
    };

    const currentKey = pageMap[currentPage];
    let currentSubmenu = null;

    // Estilo de pÃ¡gina activa
    const allLinks = document.querySelectorAll(".nav-link");
    allLinks.forEach(link => {
      const href = link.getAttribute("href");
      const isActive =
        (currentPage === "" && href === "index.html") || href === currentPage;

      if (isActive) {
        link.classList.remove("text-white");
        link.classList.add("text-moradopa", "font-bold");
      } else {
        link.classList.remove("text-moradopa");
        link.classList.add("text-white");
      }
    });

    // SubmenÃºs y toggle de Ã­cono
    if (currentKey) {
      const currentLink = document.getElementById(`link-${currentKey}`);
      const currentToggle = document.getElementById(`toggle-${currentKey}`);
      currentSubmenu = document.getElementById(`submenu-${currentKey}`);

      if (currentToggle && currentSubmenu) {
        currentToggle.classList.remove("hidden");

        currentLink.addEventListener("click", e => {
          e.preventDefault();
          currentSubmenu.classList.toggle("hidden");
          currentToggle.classList.toggle("rotate-180");
        });

        // Cierre al hacer clic fuera del submenÃº
        document.addEventListener("click", function (event) {
          const isClickInside =
            currentLink.contains(event.target) || currentSubmenu.contains(event.target);
          if (!isClickInside) {
            currentSubmenu.classList.add("hidden");
            currentToggle.classList.remove("rotate-180");
          }
        });
      }
    }

    // Efecto al hacer scroll (header y cierre submenÃº)
    const handleScroll = () => {
      if (window.scrollY > 20) {
        header.classList.remove("bg-transparent");
        header.classList.add("bg-celestepa", "shadow-md");

        if (currentSubmenu && !currentSubmenu.classList.contains("hidden")) {
          currentSubmenu.classList.add("hidden");
          const currentToggle = document.getElementById(`toggle-${currentKey}`);
          currentToggle?.classList.remove("rotate-180");
        }
      } else {
        header.classList.remove("bg-celestepa", "shadow-md");
        header.classList.add("bg-transparent");
      }
    };

    handleScroll();
    window.addEventListener("scroll", handleScroll);

    // ðŸŸ£ MENÃš MOBILE: slide + overlay
    const mobileBtn = document.getElementById("mobileMenuBtn");
    const mobileMenu = document.getElementById("mobileMenu");
    const mobileOverlay = document.getElementById("mobileOverlay");

    const openMobileMenu = () => {
      mobileMenu.classList.remove("translate-x-full");
      mobileOverlay.classList.remove("hidden");
    };

    const closeMobileMenu = () => {
      mobileMenu.classList.add("translate-x-full");
      mobileOverlay.classList.add("hidden");
    };

    mobileBtn?.addEventListener("click", openMobileMenu);
    mobileOverlay?.addEventListener("click", closeMobileMenu);
  });

const handleScroll = () => {
  if (window.scrollY > 20) {
    header.classList.remove("bg-transparent");
    header.classList.add("bg-celestepa", "shadow-md");

    if (currentSubmenu && !currentSubmenu.classList.contains("hidden")) {
      currentSubmenu.classList.add("hidden");
      const currentToggle = document.getElementById(`toggle-${currentKey}`);
      currentToggle?.classList.remove("rotate-180");
    }

    // Cerrar menÃº mobile al hacer scroll
    if (mobileMenu && mobileBtn && !mobileMenu.classList.contains("translate-x-full")) {
      mobileMenu.classList.add("translate-x-full");
      mobileBtn.classList.remove("open");
    }

  } else {
    header.classList.remove("bg-celestepa", "shadow-md");
    header.classList.add("bg-transparent");
  }
};

    const pageMap = {
      "index.html": "inicio",
      "nosotros.html": "nosotros",
      "servicios.html": "servicios",
    };

    const currentKey = pageMap[currentPage];
    let currentSubmenu = null;

    // ðŸ”· Estilo de pÃ¡gina activa
    const allLinks = document.querySelectorAll(".nav-link");
    allLinks.forEach(link => {

        (currentPage === "" && href === "index.html") || href === currentPage;

      if (isActive) {
        link.classList.remove("text-white");
        link.classList.add("text-moradopa", "font-bold");

        link.classList.remove("text-moradopa");

        currentLink.addEventListener("click", e => {
          e.preventDefault();
          currentSubmenu.classList.toggle("hidden");
          currentToggle.classList.toggle("rotate-180");
        });

        document.addEventListener("click", function (event) {
          const isClickInside =
            currentLink.contains(event.target) || currentSubmenu.contains(event.target);
          if (!isClickInside) {
            currentSubmenu.classList.add("hidden");
            currentToggle.classList.remove("rotate-180");
          }
        });
      }
    }

    // ðŸ”· Scroll: header + cierre de menÃºs
    const handleScroll = () => {
      if (window.scrollY > 20) {
        header.classList.remove("bg-transparent");
        header.classList.add("bg-celestepa", "shadow-md");

        // Cerrar submenÃº desktop
        if (currentSubmenu && !currentSubmenu.classList.contains("hidden")) {
          currentSubmenu.classList.add("hidden");

        header.classList.add("bg-transparent");

    handleScroll(); // Ejecutar al cargar

    // ðŸ”· FUNCIONES MENÃš MÃ“VIL
    const openMobileMenu = () => {

      mobileBtn.classList.add("open");
